title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 3.30 - Container closure, sealing and storage-item 19p
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 3.30 - Container closure, sealing and storage-item 19p

State Regulations
(a) Dry milk product containers and dry whey
containers shall be closed and sealed in a sanitary manner by mechanical
closing and sealing equipment. The term mechanical closing and sealing
equipment shall not exclude manually operated mechanical equipment. (b) All mechanical closing mechanisms and all
sealing mechanisms shall be designed to minimize the need for adjustment during
operation. (c) Condensed milk
product containers and condensed whey containers shall be closed and sealed in
a sanitary manner to prevent product contamination. (d) All products shall be stored in a
sanitary manner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
3.30

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
